body:
- Fixed crash on loading older, converted maps
- Fixed server not applying gamemode
- Fixed building cancel button not disappearing
- Fixed bridge animation not playing while in editor
- Fixed editor not saving or loading waves
- Fixed backup save loading causing a crash
- Fixed zone maps having incorrectly facing blocks [Submitted by Dexapnow]
- Fixed crash on giving items to sorter/overflow gate
- Updated language bundles
- Changed contributor list to be pre-cached and contain *all* contributors
- Reverted buffering for overflow gates and sorters
- Sorter with similar sort items now cannot be changed for lengths of 3 or more
name: v4 Build 78 - Beta - Hotfix
